page.title: 16Adult Recreation in Debenham
page.content: Debenham Recreational Development Council manages the Community Centre.It organizes many events,notably the annual Village Week,which usually includes the High School play,and"The Village Entertains",at which local groups perform. The Debenham Sports and Social Club which was formed in 1984 is seeking council grant aid for the building of a sports barn.There are clubs for netball,football,tennis,bowls,hockey, cricket,badminton,karate and keep-fit classes. Debenham Players perform regularly. Other groups and clubs include a Mothers Union, Womens Institute,Ever- green,Bible Study,Royal British Legion and "Any Questions".Annual events are an Antiques,Booksellers and Collectors Fair and an Exhibition and Sale of paintings and drawings.
